alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:54AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Wood, Portage, Waushara and western Waupaca Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 554 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pittsville to 7 miles northeast of Necedah to near Dellwood. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wisconsin Rapids around 610 AM CDT. Lake Wazeecha around 615 AM CDT. Plainfield around 620 AM CDT. Stevens Point and Whiting around 630 AM CDT. Wautoma and Hartman Creek State Park around 635 AM CDT. Redgranite, Amherst, Napowan Scout Camp and Chain O` Lakes-King around 640 AM CDT. Waupaca around 645 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Coddington, Kellner, Ellis, Nelsonville, King, Iola, Custer, Vesper, Saxeville and Mount Morris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
